name: Idle Tentacles
description:
This is a idle game, you don’t need to do too much, the game will be played automatically
"Hello, I wish to speak to you about our Heavenly Father and Saviour, Cthulhu."
Placement is about collecting beliefs and sacrifices, offering faith to unnameable beings to gain forbidden knowledge and the chance to summon the legendary evil gods or their families!
The game is automatic, so you can play it without much action.
Summon the the evil gods to gain powerful effects and unlock their idols (CG)!
Of course, don't worry if you're unlucky enough to summon one of their family members, at least there's a reinforcement effect!
All characters are over 18 years old
